hero.title: a based rollup
hero.text: Inspired, secured, and sequenced by Ethereum. Hi QClay :) plz halp me

advantages.title: seamless UX
advantages.text: Taiko is an Ethereum-equivalent (Type 1) ZK-EVM, maximally compatible with Ethereum. No additional compiling, reaudits, or tooling needed. Everything works out of the box, guaranteed.

advantages.title: community aligned
advantages.text: Taiko is built with the support of our community and fully open-source. Meaning it's free to use and modify the source code with the permissive license.

advantages.title: security first
advantages.text: Taiko demands no additional trust assumptions to Ethereum. As a based rollup with a permissionless (& decentralized) proposer/prover network from Day 1, Taiko inherits Ethereum's level of decentralization.

advantages.title: based
advantages.text: Taiko is a based rollup: the transaction sequencing on Taiko is done by Ethereum validators. Based sequencing is maximally simple and inherits Ethereum's liveness and credible neutrality.

about.title: Getting started with Taiko
about.text: Taiko is compatible with Ethereum at the bytecode-level, meaning everything works right out of the box.

list.title: Bridge your ETH
list.text: You can bridge your ETH to Taiko using our native bridge or another ecosystem bridge. For a walkthrough, start with the user guide’s setup page.

list.title: Change RPC provider
list.text: To configure your Ethereum tools to Taiko you’ll just need to point your favorite builder tools to a Taiko RPC Provider.

list.title: Build with your usual developer tools
list.text: Start building with your favorite toolkit.

list.title: Based Booster Rollups — scale natively, compose synchronously
list.text: Deploy on Ethereum and scale natively across all L2s.

list.title: Based Contestable Rollups — a modular, multi-proof design
list.text: Combining the best of optimistic and ZK-rollups to maximally reduce costs and increase decentralization.

ecosystem.title:
Explore 
our ecosystem
ecosystem.text: Become part of an accessible, open and inclusive ecosystem driven by a shared mission — nurturing Ethereum's Infinite Garden.
